item.title: [Video] Exploring and Exploiting an Android “Smart POS” Payment Terminal
item.description: In this talk from No Hat 2024, I go through my exploration and reverse engineering of one of the most popular “Smart POS” credit card terminals currently in use worldwide. I present the research process that led me to the discovery of multiple software vulnerabilities, ultimately granting me persistent root access to the device’s operating system.
